title: Weathered effect or plug-ins
content:
One of the regulars here offers for sale a series of plug-ins, or effects, to provide distressed, weathered or scrubbed looks for illustrations. I can't seem to find it in the archives, but I feel sure I read about it here. Does this ring any bells?

 [‹ Guess that Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121132741/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6158 "Go to previous forum topic") [Working with text sans serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121132741/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6150 "Go to next forum topic")
author: John Nolan

comments.content: Thanks. That was driving me crazy!
Just bought it myself. Great stuff. I would sugest to include even more textures.
Adriano ... I can guarantee that your wish will come true very soon. Just watch their site.
